Token.Abstract: The singleton instance of the Gestures class. The class is meant to be used as a singleton may deal with other singleton instances.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A singleton instance of the Gestures class.

Token.Abstract: The view to which the Gestures object should add the Gesture Recognizers. Ideally, this should be either the sceneView itself or a view above the scene view, one that has no views above it to intercept touch events.

The view to which the Gestures object should add the Gesture Recognizers. Ideally, this should be either the sceneView itself or a view above the scene view, one that has no views above it to intercept touch events.

The view to which the Gestures object should add the Gesture Recognizers. Ideally, this should be either the sceneView itself or a view above the scene view, one that has no views above it to intercept touch events.
The scene view used to test hits on taps and other similar gestures.
The scene view used to test hits on taps and other similar gestures.
The scene view used to test hits on taps and other similar gestures.

Tells the Gestures object to add the gesture recognizers the user opted to have, which automatically starts sending messages to the Javascript tap callback function, whenever the gestures get recognized in the gestureView.

The array used to inform the Gestures object which gesture recognizers should be initialized and added to the @p gesturesView. This is done based on the @p GestureRecognizers enum, which indicates the correct indices. All objects in this array have value @(NO); in order to opt into a specific gesture recognizer, change its index's value to @(YES).

The array used to inform the Gestures object which gesture recognizers should be initialized and added to the @p gesturesView. This is done based on the @p GestureRecognizers enum, which indicates the correct indices. All objects in this array have value @(NO); in order to opt into a specific gesture recognizer, change its index's value to @(YES).

All objects in this array have value @(NO); in order to opt into a specific gesture recognizer, change its index's value to @(YES).
